trips.title: Valentine's in Paris
trips.description: Experience the romance of Paris this Valentine's Day.

itinerary.title: Departure from Munich
itinerary.details: Meet at Munich Hauptbahnhof at 18:30. Board our luxury coach and start your journey to Paris!

itinerary.title: Explore Paris
itinerary.details: Morning arrival. Visit Eiffel Tower, Champs-Elysées, and Louvre Museum. Free time in the evening.

itinerary.title: Return to Munich
itinerary.details: Depart from Paris at 21:00, arriving back in Munich the next morning.

trips.title: Lapland Adventure
trips.description: Witness the Northern Lights on this unforgettable journey.

itinerary.title: Departure from Berlin
itinerary.details: Meet at Berlin Hbf at 17:00. Board overnight bus to Lapland.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Northern Lights Tour
itinerary.details: Explore Lapland's frozen beauty, then enjoy a guided Northern Lights tour.

itinerary.title: Return to Berlin
itinerary.details: Depart from Lapland at 19:00, arriving back in Berlin the next day.

trips.title: Santorini Escape
trips.description: Experience the breathtaking beauty of Santorini, Greece.

itinerary.title: Departure from Athens
itinerary.details: Meet at Athens Port at 08:00. Board the ferry to Santorini.

itinerary.title: Explore Santorini
itinerary.details: Visit Oia, Fira, and Red Beach. Enjoy a sunset cruise in the evening.

itinerary.title: Return to Athens
itinerary.details: Depart from Santorini at 15:00, arriving back in Athens by 20:00.

trips.title: Barcelona City Break
trips.description: Discover the vibrant culture of Barcelona, Spain.

itinerary.title: Departure from Madrid
itinerary.details: Meet at Madrid Atocha Station at 09:00. Take the high-speed train to Barcelona.

itinerary.title: Explore Barcelona
itinerary.details: Visit Sagrada Familia, Park Güell, and Las Ramblas.

itinerary.title: Return to Madrid
itinerary.details: Depart from Barcelona at 18:00, arriving back in Madrid at 21:00.

itinerary.title: Departure from Zagreb
itinerary.details: Meet at Zagreb Bus Terminal at 06:00. Travel to Split by luxury coach.

itinerary.title: Explore Split & Hvar
itinerary.details: Boat trip to Hvar Island, enjoy its beaches and historic old town.

itinerary.title: Return to Zagreb
itinerary.details: Depart from Split at 17:00, arriving back in Zagreb at 22:00.

trips.title: Lisbon & Porto Discovery
trips.description: Explore the charm of Portugal's top cities.

itinerary.title: Lisbon Sightseeing
itinerary.details: Visit Belém Tower, Tram 28 ride, and Alfama District.

itinerary.title: Day Trip to Porto
itinerary.details: Take a morning train to Porto. Enjoy wine tasting and the Ribeira district.

itinerary.title: Return to Lisbon
itinerary.details: Depart from Porto at 16:00, arriving back in Lisbon by 19:30.
